thread.title: CMS proposes $5 billion cut in lab test fees
thread.title_full: CMS proposes $5 billion cut in lab test fees

title: CMS proposes $5 billion cut in lab test fees
text:
28 CMS proposes $5 billion cut in lab test fees 
Modern Healthcare (complimentary online subscription): The CMS will begin paying the same as private insurance rates for clinical diagnostic laboratory tests starting January 1, 2017, according to a proposed rule announced Friday. The move could result in a large cuts in payments to laboratories.
